trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersEvent" /> members that specifies the type of event.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersEvent" /> 成員，可指定事件的型別。

trans-unit.source: Contains the DNS name of the server that is the target of the replication.
trans-unit.target: 包含此複寫目標的伺服器之 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter will be <see langword="null" /> if it is not used by the notification.
trans-unit.target: 如果告知不會使用它，則這個參數將會是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Contains the DNS name of the server that is the source of the replication.
trans-unit.target: 包含此複寫來源的伺服器之 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter will be <see langword="null" /> if it is not used by the notification.
trans-unit.target: 如果告知不會使用它，則這個參數將會是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException" /> object that contains additional information about any error that has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException" /> 物件，其中包含與任何發生的錯誤有關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter will be <see langword="null" /> if no error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 如果未發生任何錯誤，則這個參數將會是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Receives event notifications during a replica synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 在複本同步處理期間接收事件告知。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SyncReplicaFromAllServers method invoked on a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ADAMInstance" />, <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController" /> object should resume; <see langword="false" /> if the SyncReplicaFromAllServers method should terminate.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ADAMInstance" />、<see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController" /> 物件上叫用的 SyncReplicaFromAllServers 方法應該繼續，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果 SyncReplicaFromAllServers 方法應該結束，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: operation takes a long time to complete and potentially could fail on a server.
trans-unit.target: 作業需要很長的時間才能完成，且可能無法在伺服器上失敗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback> callback function enables the application to indicate whether the SyncReplicaFromAllServers method should continue executing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback>回呼函式可讓應用程式指示 SyncReplicaFromAllServers 方法是否應該繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: For example, the application could return false to terminate <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer.SyncReplicaFromAllServers%2A>
trans-unit.target: 例如，應用程式可能會傳回 false 終止 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer.SyncReplicaFromAllServers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another scenario in which this capability would be used is to terminate <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer.SyncReplicaFromAllServers%2A>
trans-unit.target: 這項功能會使用另一個案例是終止 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer.SyncReplicaFromAllServers%2A>

trans-unit.source: execution once the application detects that synchronization has completed for a certain target server or source server pair.
trans-unit.target: 一旦應用程式偵測到同步處理作業的執行已完成特定目標伺服器或來源伺服器組。
